thread.title: Wizards Show Up in All Black as Promised for Celtics Game
thread.title_full: Wizards Show Up in All Black as Promised for Celtics Game

title: Wizards Show Up in All Black as Promised for Celtics Game
text:
Wizards Show Up in All Black as Promised for Celtics Game January 24, 2017 7:16 PM By Chris Lingebach Filed Under: Boston Celtics , Bradley Beal , John Wall , Washington Wizards John Wall enters the arena before a game against the Boston Celtics on January 24, 2017 at Verizon Center. (Photo by Stephen Gosling/NBAE via Getty Images) 
WASHINGTON ‚Äî The Wizards pledged to arrive at Verizon Center in all black ‚Äî dressed for a funeral ‚Äî ahead of their game against the Celtics Tuesday night. 
The teams have split 1-1 thus far in their season series in what has proved to be a chippy rivalry, with their most recent meeting culminating in a benches-clearing fracas and John Wall needing to be separated from nose-poking opponent Jae Crowder . 
Before Tuesday‚Äôs game, the Wizards held true to their word, arriving in ‚Äúall black everything‚Äù attire. Chase Hughes of CSN Mid-Atlantic has video of each player arriving at the facility. Jason Smith arrives in all black for Wizards-Celtics. pic.twitter.com/ZF7WxY9DRO 
‚Äî Chase Hughes (@chasehughesCSN) January 24, 2017 The rookies arrive in all black for Wizards-Celtics. pic.twitter.com/RJaukZshNs 
‚Äî Chase Hughes (@chasehughesCSN) January 24, 2017 Tomas Satoransky arrives in all black for Wizards-Celtics: 'Gotta follow the rules.' pic.twitter.com/Xe0t9OrnIE 
‚Äî Chase Hughes (@chasehughesCSN) January 24, 2017 Even the injured Ian Mahinmi is getting in on the fun wearing all black. pic.twitter.com/FKgRssL65n 
‚Äî Chase Hughes (@chasehughesCSN) January 24, 2017 Marcin Gortat in all black: 'Don't blame me, please.' üòÇüòÇ pic.twitter.com/GwRtS0gUGG 
‚Äî Chase Hughes (@chasehughesCSN) January 24, 2017 Kelly Oubre, Jr.: 'All black, man. You know what it is.' #WizCeltics pic.twitter.com/BDLfBe6R1P 
‚Äî Chase Hughes (@chasehughesCSN) January 24, 2017 Otto Porter with the shades! Got a big reaction when he entered the locker room. #Wiz eltis pic.twitter.com/AJLhjWcVby 
‚Äî Chase Hughes (@chasehughesCSN) January 24, 2017 John Wall and Kief Morris arrive in all black for Wizards-Celtics. pic.twitter.com/LMEoRulMKA 
‚Äî Chase Hughes (@chasehughesCSN) January 24, 2017 Last but not least, Bradley Beal. pic.twitter.com/RMGZTEjKLv 
‚Äî Chase Hughes (@chasehughesCSN) January 24, 2017 Scott Brooks said his daughter told him not to wear his black jeans tonight because they make him look "chunky.' #WizCeltics 
‚Äî Chase Hughes (@chasehughesCSN) January 24, 2017 
Celtics guard Isaiah Thomas responded to the Wizards‚Äô fashion statement, calling their outfits ‚Äúcute.‚Äù "That's cute." WATCH: https://t.co/Dkh4fY735E
